definition: position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon

sentences.english: Shifts the bits of an expression to the right, maintaining sign.
sentences.chinese: 将运算式的位元向右移，保留正负号。

sentences.english: New bit allocation module reduces the two nested loop structure to one single loop .
sentences.chinese: 新的位元分配模组将双回圈架构化减为单一回圈架构。

sentences.english: This moves the carry into bit position of the accumulator.
sentences.chinese: 把进位移到累加器的位元。

sentences.english: Compared to atoms, the failure tolerance of bits is unforgiving.
sentences.chinese: 将其比作原子，位元的容错都是不可原谅的。

sentences.english: The last bits of color disappear as the burner starts to glow red.
sentences.chinese: 最后位元彩色消失，由于燃烧器开始焕发出红色。

sentences.english: Every single bit allowed by the laws of thermodynamics is put to use.
sentences.chinese: 每一个被热力学定律所允许的位元，都派上用场。

sentences.english: He does not, however, reveal the 0- or 1-bit value represented by each photon.
sentences.chinese: 不过他并没有说明各个光子的位元是0或1。

sentences.english: Our plan is the source code, which the compiler converts to bits.
sentences.chinese: 我们的规划是源代码，编辑器将其转换成位元。

sentences.english: The goal of this thesis is to lower the cost of 10GBase-T transceiver .
sentences.chinese: 本论文的目标在于降低百亿位元乙太网路的成本。

sentences.english: How many host bits are there after subnetting?
sentences.chinese: 子网路切割之后，其主机位元剩下几个？

sentences.english: Thus, a 1 bit image can only contain 2 intensity levels (21), usually displayed as "black" and "white".
sentences.chinese: 所以，一个位元，能表达两个亮度值，一般是黑和白。

sentences.english: These are 16 bit microprocessors with a segmented address space.
sentences.chinese: 这些是16位元的区段位址空间定址的微处理器。

sentences.english: The gates and memory cells are constructed of simple digital electronic components.
sentences.chinese: 而这些门和存储器位元是由简单的数字电子元件组成。

definition: an up-and-coming youngster/new talent/a brilliant younger generation
only remaining of the great (idiom); one of the few greats extant
nickname of Han dynasty general Li Guang 李廣|李广[Li3 Guang3]
Chinese Buddhist school founded on the Buddhavatamsaka-mahavaipulya Sutra (Garland sutra)
Zhao Gongming, God of Wealth in the Chinese folk tradition and Taoism
